item.name: 年份
企业户数比上年增加数量

source.condition: and v.type in ('0', '2', '4', '9') and vyear='2014' START WITH v.SYS_ZDM = (select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12 = 'HZQYB0014') CONNECT BY PRIOR v.Sys_Zdm = v.Sys_Fjd
and v.type in ('0', '2', '4', '5', '9') and vyear='2013' START WITH v.SYS_ZDM = (select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12 = 'HZQYB0014') CONNECT BY PRIOR v.Sys_Zdm = v.Sys_Fjd

item.name: 企业户数年增长率

source.condition: and v.type in ('0', '2', '4', '9') and vyear='2014' START WITH v.SYS_ZDM = (select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12 = 'HZQYB0014') CONNECT BY PRIOR v.Sys_Zdm = v.Sys_Fjd
and v.type in ('0', '2', '4', '5', '9') and vyear='2013' START WITH v.SYS_ZDM = (select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12 = 'HZQYB0014') CONNECT BY PRIOR v.Sys_Zdm = v.Sys_Fjd

item.name: 大中型企业合计户数占企业总数量比重

source.condition: and v.type in ('0', '2', '4', '9') and vyear='2014' and v.jygm in('1','2') START WITH v.SYS_ZDM = (select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12 = 'HZQYB0014') CONNECT BY PRIOR v.Sys_Zdm = v.Sys_Fjd
and v.type in ('0', '2', '4', '9') and vyear='2014' START WITH v.SYS_ZDM = (select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12 = 'HZQYB0014') CONNECT BY PRIOR v.Sys_Zdm = v.Sys_Fjd

item.name: 小型及微型企业合计户数占企业总数量比重

source.condition: and v.type in ('0', '2', '4', '9') and vyear='2014' and v.jygm in('3','4') START WITH v.SYS_ZDM = (select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12 = 'HZQYB0014') CONNECT BY PRIOR v.Sys_Zdm = v.Sys_Fjd
and v.type in ('0', '2', '4', '9') and vyear='2014' START WITH v.SYS_ZDM = (select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12 = 'HZQYB0014') CONNECT BY PRIOR v.Sys_Zdm = v.Sys_Fjd

item.name: 资产总额（期末余额）>100亿的企业户数

source.condition: and v.type in ('0', '2', '4', '9') and vyear='2014' and v.bn_zcze > 10000000000 START WITH v.SYS_ZDM = (select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12 = 'HZQYB0014') CONNECT BY PRIOR v.Sys_Zdm = v.Sys_Fjd

item.name: 资产总额超过百亿的户数同比增加数量

source.condition: and v.type in ('0', '2', '4', '9') and vyear='2014' and v.bn_zcze > 10000000000 START WITH v.SYS_ZDM = (select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12 = 'HZQYB0014') CONNECT BY PRIOR v.Sys_Zdm = v.Sys_Fjd
and vyear='2013'

item.name: 营业总收入过百亿的企业户数

source.condition: and v.type in ('0', '2', '4', '9') and vyear='2014' and v.bn_yyzsr > 10000000000 START WITH v.SYS_ZDM = (select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12 = 'HZQYB0014') CONNECT BY PRIOR v.Sys_Zdm = v.Sys_Fjd

item.name: 全省资产负债率（本年数 >0.7）的企业户数

source.condition: and v.type in ('0', '2', '4', '9') and vyear='2014' and v.bn_zcfzl > 70 START WITH v.SYS_ZDM = (select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12 = 'HZQYB0014') CONNECT BY PRIOR v.Sys_Zdm = v.Sys_Fjd

item.name: 全省资产负债率（本年数 >0.7）的企业户数占比

and v.type in ('0', '2', '4', '9') and vyear='2014' START WITH v.SYS_ZDM = (select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12 = 'HZQYB0014') CONNECT BY PRIOR v.Sys_Zdm = v.Sys_Fjd

item.name: 全省资产负债率（本年数 >1.0）的企业户数

source.condition: and v.type in ('0', '2', '4', '9') and vyear='2014' and v.bn_zcfzl > 100 START WITH v.SYS_ZDM = (select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12 = 'HZQYB0014') CONNECT BY PRIOR v.Sys_Zdm = v.Sys_Fjd

and v.type in ('0', '2', '4', '9') and vyear='2014' START WITH v.SYS_ZDM = (select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12 = 'HZQYB0014') CONNECT BY PRIOR v.Sys_Zdm = v.Sys_Fjd

item.name: 盈利总金额（本年决算数）

item.name: 亏损总金额（本年决算数）
